Item.Description: For each drug listed, please choose the option that best describes your use pattern. Consider only drugs taken without prescription from your doctor or that you've taken differently than prescribed; for alcohol, don't count just a few sips from someone else's drink.
LSD, MDA, Mushrooms, Peyote, other hallucinogens
(Glue, gasoline, spray cans, whiteout, rush etc.)

These questions refer to your use of alcohol and other drugs (like marijuana/weed or cocaine/rock). Circle all the answers which describe your use of alcohol and/or other drug(s). Even if none of the answers seem exactly right, please pick the ones that come closest to being true. If a question doesn't apply to you, you may leave it blank.
What effects has using alcohol or drugs had on your life? (CHOOSE ALL THAT APPLY)

item.label: Has interfered with talking to someone
Has prevented me from having a good time
Have lost friends because of use
Has gotten me into trouble at home
Has resulted in an accident, an injury, arrest, or being punished at school for using alcohol or drugs

Item.Description: How do you feel about your use of alcohol or drugs? (CHOOSE ALL THAT APPLY)

item.label: I can control it and set limits on myself
I can control myself, but my friends easily influence me
I often feel bad about my use
I need help to control myself
I have had professional help to control my drinking or drug use

Item.Description: How do others see you in relation to your alcohol or drug use (CHOOSE ALL THAT APPLY)

item.label: Can't say or normal for my age
When I use I tend to neglect my family or friends
My family or friends advice me to control or cut down on my use
My family or friends tell me to get help for my alcohol or drug use
My family or friends have already gone for help about my use

In the past 12 months, did you drink alcoholic beverages or use other substances for any of the following reasons?

item.label: To experiment (to see what it's like)
Because I am "hooked" (I feel I have to drink)
To have a good time with my friends
Because of boredom, nothing else to do
To get away from my problems or troubles

Item.Description: In the past 12 months, have you experienced any of the following as a result of your drinking alcohol or using other substances?
Had friends or family members worry or complain about your drinking
Felt bad or guilty about your drinking
Created problems between you and your friends or family members
Gotten into trouble at work or school because of drinking
Been ticketed or arrested because of your drinking
Driven a car while under the influence
Gotten into physical fights when drinking
Forgot where you were or what you did (blacked out)
Been in trouble with police, residence hall, or other college authorities
C. Short Answer: For the following questions, please reference standard drink guide attached
For FEMALES: Think back over the last two weeks. How many times have you had 4 or more alcoholic drinks in one sitting?

STANDARD DRINK GUIDE: Beer or Cooler (~5%) -12 oz = 1 drink -16 oz = 1.3 drinks -22 oz = 2 drinks -40 oz = 3.3 drinks Malt Liquor (~7% alcohol) -12 oz = 1.5 drinks -16 oz = 2 drinks -22 oz = 2.5 drinks -40 oz = 4.5 drinks Table Wine (~12% alcohol) -750mL (25 oz) bottle = 5 drinks 80-Proof Spirits/Hard Liquor (~40% alcohol) -a mixed drink = 1 or more (depending on recipe) -a pint (16 oz) = 11 drinks -a fifth (25 oz) = 17 drinks -1.75L (59 oz) = 39 drinks
For MALES: Think back over the last two weeks. How many times have you had 5 or more alcoholic drinks in one sitting?

STANDARD DRINK GUIDE: Beer or Cooler (~5%) -12 oz = 1 drink -16 oz = 1.3 drinks -22 oz = 2 drinks -40 oz = 3.3 drinks Malt Liquor (~7% alcohol) -12 oz = 1.5 drinks -16 oz = 2 drinks -22 oz = 2.5 drinks -40 oz = 4.5 drinks Table Wine (~12% alcohol) -750mL (25 oz) bottle = 5 drinks 80-Proof Spirits/Hard Liquor (~40% alcohol) -a mixed drink = 1 or more (depending on recipe) -a pint (16 oz) = 11 drinks -a fifth (25 oz) = 17 drinks -1.75L (59 oz) = 39 drinks
On those occasions when you do drink alcohol, how many drinks do you typically have?
